author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Inventiva Launches Capital Increase Of About EUR 30 Million
text:
April 12 (Reuters) - INVENTIVA SA:
* INVENTIVA LAUNCHES A CAPITAL INCREASE TO RAISE APPROXIMATELY â‚¬30 MILLION
* RESERVED OFFERING WILL COMMENCE IMMEDIATELY AND IS EXPECTED TO BE FINALIZED BEFORE MARKET TOMORROW, SUBJECT TO ACCELERATION OR EXTENSION AT ANY TIME
* CAPITAL INCREASE BY MEANS OF A PRIVATE PLACEMENT RESERVED TO A SPECIFIED CATEGORY OF INVESTORS
* NET PROCEEDS ARE EXPECTED TO PROVIDE COMPANY WITH CASH RUNWAY BASED ON ON-GOING PROGRAMMES TO MID-2020 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
